title: Tapestry: Don Quichotte guéri de sa folie par la sagesse, from L'Histoire de don Quichotte Series
description: Tapestry: Don Quichotte guéri de sa folie par la sagesse, from L'Histoire de don Quichotte Series; Woven at the Royal Factory of Furniture to the Crown at the Gobelins Manufactory (French, founded 1662 - present), under the direction of Michel Audran (French, 1701 - 1771), and his son Jean Audran fils (French, died 1794, active Gobelin Manufactory 1771 - 1794), et al; Gobelins, France; 1773; Silk and wool; 370.8 × 386.1 cm (146 × 152 in.); 82.DD.66; J.
